description: '''Afroswing''', also known as '''Afrobashment''', or less commonly '''Afrobbean''' or '''Afrowave''', is a genre of music that developed in the [[United Kingdom|UK]] during the mid-2010s, derivative of [[dancehall]] and [[afrobeats]], with influences from [[Trap music|trap]], [[UK rap|British hip hop]], [[Contemporary R&B|R&B]], and [[Grime (music genre)|grime]]. Commercially, the genre has been very successful, with many afroswing artists making it into the [[Official Charts Company|British charts]].
